title: Lankan Finance Minister Will Seek Sitharaman’s Help To Steer Country Out Of Crisis At IMF Meet - News18
content: Lankan Finance Minister Will Seek Sitharaman’s Help To Steer Country Out Of Crisis At IMF Meet  News18
description: Union minister for finance Nirmala Sitharaman and the Chief Economic Advisor (CEA) V Anantha Nageswaran are in Washington to attend the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and World Bank. The finance minister will also attend the meeting of G20 finance ministers and the meeting of the central bank chiefs, according to the finance ministry.
